content: skill level easy pattern number m24110 lgc sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x the dress is made in 4 pieces back front and 2 sleeves the stripe sequences are both charted and in writing a small edging is worked around edges of assembled dress finished chest about 34 39 43 45 50 54 58 63 67 in 86 5 99 109 114 5 127 137 147 5 160 170 cm finished length about 26 27 28 28 29 29 29 30 30 in 66 68 5 71 71 73 5 73 5 73 5 76 76 cm lion brand® local grown cotton art #667 184yrd/168m 3 5oz/100g #134 terra cotta 3 3 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 balls a #140 dusty pink 2 3 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 balls b #133 pumpkin 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 balls c stitch markers large-eyed blunt needle crochet hook size i-9 5 5 mm gauge 16 sts 4 3 double_crochet chain 1 groups + 7 25 row = about 4 in 10 cm note free registration at site is required to access patterns
